definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom

sentences.english: He is young at heart and is fond of watching cartoons with his grandson.
sentences.chinese: 他是个老来少，最爱跟孙子一起看动画片。

definition: Amaranthaceae, family of herbaceous plants containing Chinese spinach (Amaranthus inamoenus) 莧菜
Asteraceae or Compositae (composites), a large family of dicotyledonous plants producing scents, includes aster, daisy and sunflower
rosette bok choy (Brassica rapa var. rosularis)
day lily (Hemerocallis), used in Chinese medicine and cuisine
variant of 油麥菜|油麦菜[you2 mai4 cai4]
